name: Holy Storm
desc: Bolts of divine energy rain down from the skies upon up to 3 targets within range, who must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d8 radiant damage plus 1d8 radiant damage per AP spent past the first, halved on a success.
empower: Target two additional targets and deals additional damage equal to your proficiency modifier times your spellcasting stat, which is divided evenly amongst all targets. This additional damage is not reduced by a successful saving throw.
author: CrusaderDroid
